subject: Re: New page ready - Trueline
preview: Should be good!  Looks like most of the main products have been established.  Just waiting on the 2x briefs for the Freestanding Patios and Integrated Living (aka Eve Cutbacks).  Similar to the Pallas

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Should be good!

Looks like most of the main products have been established.

Just waiting on the 2x briefs for the Freestanding Patios and Integrated Living (aka Eve Cutbacks).

Similar to the Pallas page, for Integrated Living, we will need to send the content writing to you guys as we're not 100% familiar with the product.

And then my team will edit the copy and ensure it's SEO friendly.

FYI, I've tried looking for the product on the old site, but I couldn't seem to find it either? Was searching through Wayback Machine.

If you guys have any additional information on the product, that would help tremendously with the brief.

Thanks!

@joel all good on this one. Customer is just chatting to SEO agency. No further action required. 

@ricaV2 have you logged time in harvest for this request? (checking before I close ticket)

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: @joel could you please check this last email thread from cx? I'm not sure what they mean

Hi @ricaV2,

I wanted to let you know that I have completed the updates you requested. Specifically, I have added a new /pergolas/ page to the navigation menu, as you requested. Please see the screenshot below for reference.

Additionally, I noticed that the menu was broken after I added the pergolas menu. After some investigation, I believe this was due to the high number of menu items. However, I was able to fix the issue and the menu should now be functioning properly.

Please check, thanks
